message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth at least that much to me and I know it's worth the same to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $1200000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Let's split the difference - I'm willing to sell for $1250000. This ensures we both get a fair deal and I can move on with the sale.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $1225000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our values.
